{
  "url": "https://www.neptun.mk/categories/gaming_laptopi/HP-Victus-16-r0078nia-16-1--i5-13500H-16GB-DDR5-512GB-RTX-4050-6GB",
  "title": "ЛАПТОП HP VICTUS 16-R0078NIA 16.1\" I5-13500H/16GB DDR5/512GB/RTX 4050 6GB",
  "warranty": "12",
  "regular_price": "72.999",
  "happy_price": "63.999",
  "features": {
    "Display": "16.1\" (40.9cm)",
    "Resolution": "(1920 x 1080) FHD IPS 144 Hz, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, 45% NTSC",
    "Processor": "Intel® Core™ i5-13500H (up to 4.7 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 18 MB L3 cache, 12 cores, 16 threads)",
    "Graphics": "NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4050 6 GB GDDR6",
    "RAM": "16 GB DDR5-5200 MHz RAM (2 x 8 GB)",
    "Storage": "512 GB PCIe® Gen4 NVMe™ TLC M.2 SSD",
    "Wireless": "Wi-Fi 6 MT7921 (2x2) + Bluetooth® 5.3",
    "Camera": "HP True Vision 1080p FHD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones",
    "Audio": "Audio by B&O; Dual speakers; HP Audio Boost",
    "Network": "10/100/1000 GbE LAN",
    "USB Type-A Port (5Gbps)": "1 x USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (HP Sleep and Charge)",
    "USB Type-C Port (5Gbps)": "1 x USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate (USB Power Delivery, DisplayPort™ 1.4, HP Sleep and Charge)",
    "Additional USB Type-A Ports (5Gbps)": "2 x USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate",
    "HDMI Port": "1 x HDMI 2.1",
    "RJ45 Ethernet Port": "1 x RJ-45",
    "AC Smart Pin Port": "1 x AC smart pin",
    "Headset Port": "1 x headphone/microphone combo",
    "Power Adapter": "230 W Smart AC power adapter",
    "Battery": "4-cell, 70 Wh Li-ion polymer"
  }
}
